returns._0: Amount of tokens claimable at this moment

getNextVestingDate().details: If all tokens are already vested, return 0

returns._0: Timestamp of the next vesting date

returns.nextVestingDate: Timestamp when next amount will vest
returns.remainingAmount: Amount still locked for future vesting
returns.vestedAmount: Total amount that has vested so far

vestingAmount().details: Calculates the amount of tokens to be released per slot

vestingInterval().details: Calculates the time between each slot

withdraw().details: Transfers the claimable tokens to the recipient

getClaimableAmount().notice: Get the amount of tokens that are currently claimable

getOwner().notice: Returns the owner of the lock contract

getSlots().notice: Returns the number of vesting slots

vestingAmount().notice: Returns the amount of tokens to be vested per slot
